alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 23 at 8:39PM CDT until August 25 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Ellis and Kaufman Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Henderson and Navarro Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River Near Rosser. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Minor to moderate flooding of low areas and roads within the levees is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 35.1 feet. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 8.6 feet Sunday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
